trans-unit.source: Provides a service that can generate unique names for objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供服务，可以生成对象的唯一名称。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader> can implement this service to provide a way for a designer to create new, unique names for objects.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader>可以实现此服务提供一种方法为设计器创建新的对象的唯一名称。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader>

trans-unit.source: If this service is not available, the designer uses a default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 如果此服务不可用，则该设计器使用的默认实现。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new name that is unique to all components in the specified container.
trans-unit.target: 创建仅可用于指定的容器中的所有组件的新名称。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a name for the new object that is unique within the specified container.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回在指定的容器中是唯一的新对象的名称。

trans-unit.source: The container where the new object is added.
trans-unit.target: 其中添加新的对象的容器。

trans-unit.source: The data type of the object that receives the name.
trans-unit.target: 接收的对象的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: A unique name for the data type.
Gets a value indicating whether the specified name is valid.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示指定的名称是否有效。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.INameCreationService> can have rules that define the parameters for valid names.
trans-unit.target: 实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.INameCreationService>可以定义有效的名称的参数的规则。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.INameCreationService>

trans-unit.source: This method can be implemented to validate a name and enforce those rules.
trans-unit.target: 可实现此方法来验证名称和强制实施这些规则。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the name is valid; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该名称是否有效;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the specified name is valid.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示指定的名称是否有效。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.INameCreationService> can have rules that define the parameters for valid names.
trans-unit.target: 实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.INameCreationService>可以定义有效的名称的参数的规则。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.INameCreationService>

trans-unit.source: This method can be implemented to validate a name and enforce those rules.
trans-unit.target: 可实现此方法来验证名称和强制实施这些规则。

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.INameCreationService.IsValidName%2A>, except that this method throws an exception if the name is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 此方法类似于是<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.INameCreationService.IsValidName%2A>，只不过此方法将引发异常，如果该名称无效。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.INameCreationService.IsValidName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows implementers to provide detailed information in the exception message.
trans-unit.target: 这允许实施者能提供的异常消息中的详细的信息。
